resources.string: Welcome to PhotoDoc, an application that lets you get powerful insight into an image. With PhotoDoc, you can select an image either from your gallery or capture one, upload it, and it\'ll provide you with a list of all things your image might be or have! Whether you want to identify a dog breed, a product or get web links for a product in the image, PhotoDoc has you covered! \n\nEnjoy!
For support, reach out to %1$s or leave comments on the Playstore.
Want to know what you\'re looking at?
Upload a picture and see what I can find!
Get information like text, logos, products and more from images!
Want to know a dog\'s breed?
You can either browse for an image or straight up click from the camera!
I found %1$d label(s) related to your image.
I also found %1$d product(s) in your image.
I also went ahead and found %1$d web result(s) with your image in them.
From what I can tell, it is related to:
You appear to be offline. Please try again later.
